verbs.description: [ARG0: John Kelly] [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: called] [ARG1: President Trump] [ARG2: an “ idiot ”] [ARGM-TMP: while questioning his intelligence on policy issues during a meeting] .
[ARG0: John Kelly] reportedly called President Trump an “ idiot ” while [V: questioning] [ARG1: his intelligence on policy issues] [ARGM-TMP: during a meeting] .
